scene_end_anchor: Varkas attacked Kaelen in the Map Room of the High Spire. The Commander's body has been transformed into a vessel for the silver rot. Kaelen is now forced to fight his mentor to survive and protect the Star-Maps.
constraints: Varkas must die by Kaelen's hand
The Star-Maps must be retrieved before the scene ends
The silver rot's influence must be described with sensory detail
The structural instability of the Spire must escalate
next_action: Kaelen engages in a lethal duel with the corrupted Varkas to claim the Star-Maps.
